name: The Wild Oasis
summary: This project is a real-world like porject intimate the inside website for a booking system for cabins.

gifs.explanation: The user can view the details of each booking, and can also check in the booking.
The registered user can log in can check their purchase history on the dashboard, and they can change their housetype for a rough estimation of the CO2 emmission of the household.
For a precise calculation of the CO2 emission of the household, the user can use the footprint calculator panel to seek the results.

name: Solar Offset
summary: This project aimed to create a platform for UK residents to fund solar panels in African countries.

gifs.explanation: The application allows registered and non-registered user to select and pay for the solar plan of their choices.
The registered user can log in can check their purchase history on the dashboard, and they can change their housetype for a rough estimation of the CO2 emmission of the household.
For a precise calculation of the CO2 emission of the household, the user can use the footprint calculator panel to seek the results.

name: Bird Sighting
summary: This project is for bird lovers to post their spottings of bird with and without WiFi. And they are also chat online to share their thoughts about this bird.
details: This project is designed for bird lovers to share their spottings of the bird they spotted. The user can post new birding sighings with and without Wi-fi. And all the sightings that have been viewed when the Wifi is availiable are saved in the IndexedDB for offline viewing.

gifs.explanation: The users can chat in real-time, the chat history will be saved in the database.
The registered user can log in can check their purchase history on the dashboard, and they can change their housetype for a rough estimation of the CO2 emmission of the household.
For a precise calculation of the CO2 emission of the household, the user can use the footprint calculator panel to seek the results.

name: React Pizza.co
summary: This application allows users to easily browse and order pizzas online. Using React Router, Redux, and Thunks for state management, it offers a streamlined and responsive user experience.
details: This project is for practicing, leveraging React Router for smooth navigation and integrating Redux with Thunks for efficient state management. Tailwind CSS was also explored for a modern web design. I also designed 'apiRestaurant' for fetching the data menu and order infomation.

gifs.explanation: The user can view and order the pizza. The express delivery can be selected when placing the order, or when viewing the summary of the order.

The user can search the order in the application. If the order exsits, the infomation of the customer and the order details will be shown. If the order does not exist, the not found page would display.
